content: this is a great pattern for little girls who love tights a great worsted cotton it is perfect for summer or fall features include lacy drape enclosed elastic waist-band and easy shaping size 2t with alterations for size 4t this pattern is also available as a knit kit complete with cotton blend yarn from www baresheepyarn com here you can buy the pattern seperate for $5 or the complete kit for $22 99
